newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thai minister does not rule out foreign borrowing.
newsitem.headline: Thai minister does not rule out foreign borrowing.

text.p: Thai Finance Minister Thanong Bidaya said on Friday that he did not rule out foreign borrowing to bail the country out of economic trouble.
He also denied speculation that the government was set to sack Bank of Thailand Governor Rerngchai Marakanond.
Thanong told reporters that whether Thailand will borrow or not depended on a number of factors.
"I've never said that the government will not borrow from abroad. What I said was we did not borrow when I visited Japan," he told reporters.
